entries.content: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry is a large, seven-story high building supported by magic, with a hundred and forty-two staircases throughout its many towers and turrets and very deep dungeons.
Albus Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts. He is considered the most powerful wizard of his time, and is known for his kindness, wisdom, and twinkling blue eyes.
